title: Umi no Juunin to wa Koi wa Shinai
original_name: 海の住人とは恋はしない
sinopse: Yuuya is forced to cross dress and work in his mom's bar. One day he has to serve rowdy fishermen. One of the fishermen is younger than the others and seems to instantly fall for Yuuya's crossdressed form, which slowly develops into a friendship and maybe more...
